description:
Yuki and the gang begin their "field trip" to a mall on the outskirts of town. 
While raiding the supermarket on the basement for supplies, Kurumi chances upon a puppy... None other than the School Living Club`s future mascot, Taromaru! He happily joins the girls as they make their way to the fifth floor, where Mii-kun remains hunkered down.
Source: crunchyroll
